name: py-deprecated

variants.name: build_system

description:
Python @deprecated decorator to deprecate old python classes, functions
or methods.

A Python utility that aids in the process of downloading, building,
upgrading, installing, and uninstalling Python packages.

Particle provides a pythonic interface to the Particle Data Group (PDG)
particle data tables and particle identification codes, with extended
particle information and extra goodies.
